phases.title: Discovery & Research
phases.description: We start by understanding your business goals, target audience, and project requirements through detailed consultations and market research.

phases.title: UI/UX Design
phases.description: Our designers create beautiful, intuitive interfaces with wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes in Figma, ensuring excellent user experience.

phases.title: Frontend Development
phases.description: We bring designs to life with clean, responsive code using React, modern CSS frameworks, and smooth animations for an engaging user experience.

phases.title: Backend Development
phases.description: We build robust server-side logic, APIs, and database structures to power your application with secure and scalable architecture.

phases.title: Testing & QA
phases.description: Rigorous testing ensures your application works flawlessly across all devices, browsers, and scenarios before launch.

phases.title: SEO Optimization
phases.description: We optimize your website for search engines to improve visibility, ranking, and organic traffic through technical and on-page SEO.

phases.title: Security & Hosting
phases.description: We deploy your application on secure, reliable hosting with SSL certificates, monitoring, and backup systems in place.

phases.title: Handover & Support
phases.description: We provide comprehensive documentation, training, and ongoing support to ensure you can manage and maintain your platform successfully.
